name: Eep! A Game of Lost Sheep (APU Games and Interactive Media)
name_original: Eep! A Game of Lost Sheep (APU Games and Interactive Media)
description:
Eep! A Game of Lost Sheep

A game produced at APU by Zackary Felix.

Contact: zfelix20@apu.edu

Description

Play as Mariam, a young shepherd, who has to find her five lost sheep! Journey around the nearby environments, collect items and talk to new people!

Controls

Z/X/Enter (Start); arrow keys (Movement)
